title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
created_time: December 14, 2022, 07:18:28 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:42:56 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
content: WHAT IS RENECRENEC, which simply means Remitano Network Coin, is the native coin of the well known Remitano Cryptocurrency exchange, and also the coin that powers Renec Blockchain. Renec Blockchain is a decentralized blockchain platform designed to enable creators build their experiences that provides to the billions of users in the web 3 era. This is a Blockchain designed to make it possible for users to transact quickly with cheaper fees, secure escrow, and execute complex smart contracts using the RENEC coin. The journey began in 2021, but the blockchain mainnet(beta) was fully launched in 2022. WHY RENEC BLOCKCHAIN?1. SCALABILITY: Renec Blockchain is highly scalable, built with the ability to process thousands of transactions per second, it is faster than most L1 blockchains. Renec blockchain is also scalable in the sense that, it is built to allow as many new blockchain technologies as possible to be added to the network anytime the need arises, no forks of any kind. 2. LOW FEES: On Renec Blockchain, fee per transaction is as low as $0.0002. 3. CROSSCHAIN TECHNOLOGY: Renec Blockchain uses technology that allows users to exchange assets across different blockchains using only a single coin, RENEC. Accordingly, Renec Blockchain will lock many tokens on its blockchain and unlock them on another blockchain and vice versa easy, simple and seemless. 4. HIGH PERFORMANCE AND SECURITY: Renec Blockchain runs on a powerful blockchain protocol known as DPOS technology. DPoS Technology (Delegated Proof of Stake) - is a protocol in the blockchain being used by famous networks like EOS, TRON and Cardano. DPoS is a product born to solve the shortcomings of PoS and PoW protocols, two protocols that most crypto projects are using today.DPoS possesses a technology-based parliamentary democratic way of operation. This approach is intended to overcome some of the shortcomings of concentration.This technology was created by Daniel Larimer, it is a consensus mechanism for shareholders to vote for delegates. These delegates will then be responsible for validating transactions and maintaining the system.RENEC BLOCKCHAIN/COIN BASICSCOIN: RENEC BLOCKCHAIN: Renec BlockchainPROTOCOL: Delegated proof of stake(DPoS)COIN TYPE: Utility CoinSUPPLY: 73,957,475WEBSITE: https://renec.foundationEXPLORER: https://explorer.renec.foundationWALLET: https://wallet.renec.foundationRENEC BLOCKCHAIN DOCUMENTATION: https://docs.renec.foundationWHITEPAPER: https://remitano.com/renec-whitepaperOFFICIAL SOCIAL HANDLESOfficial Twitter: https://twitter.com/RenecBlockchainOfficial Telegram Channel: https://t.me/renecblockchainOfficial Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/renecblockchainJOIN THE OFFICIAL CHATRENEC MARKETS1. Remitano Exchange :https://remitano.net/swap/usdt_renecTOKENOMICS & ROADMAP Total supply is RENEC coin during mainnet launch is 73,957,475.. And below image shows the allocation details... And also the project Roadmap..  Disclaimer:This is not an official Ann thread of this project, I am not a member of the team and not affiliated with them in anyway, I am just an investor who thought to bringthe awareness of this great project to this forum, I won't be held responsible for your investment decisions, Please do your own research and invest wisely.

comments.created_time: December 14, 2022, 07:19:11 PMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:41:42 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: CURRENT OFFERSBecome a Validator on Renec Blockchain and earn RewardsðŸ“¢ RENEC Blockchain - Becoming our Individual Contributor!On November 30, 2022, the RENEC Foundation issued a notice calling for registration to participate in the Delegation Program with a specific set of criteria to become a delegator of RENEC Blockchain and receive a delegation from the RENEC foundation. Suppose you are not yet qualified to be a delegator of the RENEC Foundation, you can still act as an Individual Contributor by building your node with the Validator program using the following instructions:âž¡ How to run a validator: https://docs.renec.foundation/running-validatorðŸ“¢ RENEC Blockchain Delegation Program - Call out for Registration!The RENEC Foundation strongly encourages the growth of the community of independent validators, as we understand this strong community will form the backbone of the RENEC blockchain network.To achieve this mission, we are calling out for contributors who are keen on joining us and become one of our validators.âž¡ Submit your application to our Delegation Program: https://bit.ly/renecdelegationprogramâž¡ Learn more detail about our Delegation Program and its criteria: https://bit.ly/renecdelegationprograminfoRENEC FOUNDATION GRANT FOR DAPP PROJECTðŸ“¢ RENEC Foundation - Grants for dApps projects!RENEC Foundation wishes to launch a program to support start-up dApps projects built and operated on RENEC Blockchain, as we believe that this goodwill will bring a strong ecosystem for everyone in the Web3 era.âž¡ Register for grants at: https://bit.ly/renecgrantsâž¡ Benefits:- Grants include: Project Launching Bonus & Full project gas fee for 3 years (but not exceeding the Launching Bonus)- Launching Bonus level: 25K, 50K, 75K, 100K RENEC- After launching MVP, the project enjoys media benefits including: 5 articles on RENEC Foundation's official social media pages, Banner introduced on RENEC wallet in 15 daysâž¡ Granting process:1. Individuals/Organizations submit an application in the form above2. RENEC Foundation evaluates, decides on the Launching Bonus level, and sends back the Promise of Funding to the project3. After receiving the Promise of Funding, the project needs to launch the MVP and receive instantly 1/12 of the Launching Bonus4. The remaining 11 parts of the Launching Bonus will be divided equally and paid to the project in the next 11 months5. The project receives all gas burnt on its contracts within 3 years, paid in quarterly manner.
